column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Angela - Thanks for your review. I sincerely apologize for your having received a dirty sake cup. My staff have been reprimanded for the mistake and new policies have been enacted to ensure this error doesn't happen again. I presume you pointed this out to your server at the time
column2: and that you received clean sake cups. Furthermore
column3: I hope my staff fulfilled the rest of your parties' needs. Understandably
column4: you posted that you don't intend to visit us again
column5: but if on the off chance that you do
column6: please ask for me or any of my managers (Darcie
column11: and we will take care of you.
